thread.title: Diego Costa dishes out a painful punishment to a friend (Video)
thread.title_full: Diego Costa dishes out a painful punishment to a friend (Video)

author: Benjamin Newman
title: Diego Costa dishes out a painful punishment to a friend (Video)
text:
Diego Costa dishes out a painful punishment to a friend (Video)   Diego Costa chilling 
After scrapping it out against Arsenal on the pitch on Saturday in the Premier League, Chelsea striker Diego Costa spent time with friends and family in the evening. 
Diego’s brother Jair uploaded a picture on Instagram showing how the Chelsea striker was relaxing. 
Indeed, others in the crew posted pictures from Stamford Bridge during the Arsenal game on Instagram, as they saw the Blues go nine points clear of Tottenham at the top of the table. A video posted by Joel Silva (@joeldahsilva) on Feb 4, 2017 at 9:08am PST Feb 4, 2017 at 9:31am PST Diego Costa dishes out the pain 
Costa posted a video on social media which wasn’t the easiest of watches. 
The Chelsea striker dished out painful punishment on one of his friends. 
It’s unclear what the guy did wrong to get this treatment. Diego Costa dishes out a painful punishment to a friend pic.twitter.com/Inqk5R1b6Y 
— 101 Great Goals (@102greatgoals) February 4, 2017 Loading tags...
